items.content_html: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.

items.content_html: InfoSeek is a lightweight, responsive web application that simplifies accessing information from Wikipedia. The project is designed to provide users with an intuitive platform to search and explore knowledge efficiently. Using the CCBP wiki-search API, it dynamically fetches and displays search results based on user input in real time.
items.title: Nithishkumar786/infoseek: InfoSeek is a lightweight, responsive web application that simplifies accessing information from Wikipedia. The project is designed to provide users with an intuitive platform to search and explore knowledge efficiently. Using the CCBP wiki-search API, it dynamically fetches and displays search results based on user input in real time.
